description: Angular component 'NoteCardComponent' for displaying and interacting with a note card, including editing and deleting functionality.

classes.name: NoteCardComponent
classes.description: Angular component for displaying a note card with edit and delete functionalities.

methods.name: onEdit
methods.description: Emit an event to signal that the note should be edited.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Emit an event to signal that the note should be deleted.
